channel.title: Tolkien on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Tolkien on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: J.R.R. Tolkien Estate to Be Represented by London-Based Agency Curtis Brown Heritage
item.description: “We are committed to keeping his stories alive for generations to come,” the Tolkien Estate said in a statement on Wednesday.
